textConfig.title: Making a world-class education possible
textConfig.intro: We meet the full financial need of every admitted undergraduate who qualifies for assistance. We do not expect students to borrow to meet their need.

quoteConfig.quote: ...it came with such a generous financial aid package, that made the decision really easy for me. I just figured, okay, if it’s the cheapest option and it’s Stanford, might as well take it.
quoteConfig.name: Grayson Armour
